data.title: Carol Friedman Bio, Listings, and Contact Info
data.meta_description: Carol found the perfect career selling New York City real-estate, with her love for New York there can be no better choice.Carol has lived abroad and created...
data.text:
Carol found the perfect career selling New York City real-estate, with her love for New York there can be no better choice.

Carol has lived abroad and created an international sales and fashion merchandising company ,putting her on the path to success. Carol possesses more then 20 years of sales an negotiating expertise dealing and working with international companies. Through Carols previous business she has acquired a client base of international investors.

Carol is dedicated to her buyers and sellers. Carol's clients benefit from her diligent, determined approach to business. She understands the responsibility that is placed in her hands and takes this very seriously. She is client focused-result driven and marketing savvy ,she is referred to as"professional ,honorable and a person with integrity".

Carol listens to the needs of her clients and strives to achieve their goals, always having the best interest of the customer at heart. She takes prides on finding the perfect apartments for her clients at the best price. Carol's excellent track record makes her stand out from the rest. She has handled difficult transactions with ease, so if you are looking for a smooth transaction and a knowledgeable broker contact Carol.

Carol's passion for the city and running a business have come together in real- estate.

The rght broker makes a difference
